reviews.customers_say: Customers praise the sweater's high-quality cashmere material and beautiful colors.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best cashmere sweaters ever
items.body: I bought several of these sweaters about 10 years ago from a high quality online shop. They are absolutely the BEST cashmere sweaters. The perfect weight (not too hot but not thin), excellent quality, never any pilling. I haven't needed to replace them, although I've bought other cashmere sweaters at very good stores, other than standard colors... they all pill, regardless of price. They all disappoint. I happened to need a brown one & googled it, wishing I could find this brand and I was delighted to find them here! I normally wear an XL but buy the XXL because I like a loose, comfy sweater & sometimes like to layer. Buy these sweaters, you will not be disappointed. Don't waste your money on junk cashmere, this is an investment piece that will last forever. Read more
items.author: Jersey Girl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful
items.body: These cashmere sweaters are wonderful. Not thin like so many, not super long like so many, and lots of rich, beautiful colors. I bought several and love them! Read more
items.author: Lucy's Mom

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Shephe V neck cashmere sweater
items.body: This sweater is so beautiful. The soft pink and the soft feel is amazingly perfect. Shipped on time. Will order from Shephe again in the near future. Read more
items.author: Bobbi S.

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Shipped out of China
items.body: Sizing is not accurate. Ordered an extra large as I was not sure where it was manufactured. Received it and no label inside so I suspected it was knitted in China. Normally I wear a medium. Chose not to return it even with an Amazon store a mile away. Read more
items.author: grfinch

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The main thing is that this a a wonderfully soft, medium weight
items.body: This sweater is large on me. I probably wear a medium to a small (5 ft and 137 lbs), but I didn't want this to be tight around the middle. So, I knew what I was doing when I ordered it. The main thing is that this a a wonderfully soft, medium weight, high quality cashmere sweater. I love it, and will undoubtedly buy this brand again. (This is my second Shephe cashmere sweater.) The color, light grey, is also very nice, kind of bluish grey...perfect. Read more
items.author: JLS

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great color and value
items.body: I wanted it to be loose but a L would probably have been fine also Read more
items.author: Cate Ebbs

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the quality and
items.body: My third purchase. Love the quality and price Read more
items.author: Mary G.

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars A man’s cut disguised as a woman’s sweater
items.body: The armpits were HUGE! The shoulder seams drooped off the shoulder. The 4 ply 7 garage off-white showed my bra through (definitely should not have if that were it’s true gauge). Terrible fit. Read more
items.author: PickyPixie

short_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sky Blue, Brown, Burgundy, Grey Blue, Chocolate, Charcoal Grey, Black, Apple Green, Dark Red, Blue Jean Grey, Navy, Off-white, Pink, Beige. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
